Posts.Content: Is it possible to accurately calculate PSA doubling time with an ultrasensitive assay at very low PSA levels? For example, my PSA level was at 0.028 in April 2013 and went to 0.055 in October 2014 with tests given every 2-3 months apart. Given that information, is it 18 months? Or is the standard assay more reliable at calculating PSA doubling time? I had RP August 2012 only negatives on path was 3+4 gleason positive margin at apex .Should i go ahead with salvage radiation now at such a low level and risk overtreatment or wait un BCR ( 0.2 AND RISING ) is evident ? PLEASE HELP !
Posts.Title: Doubling time & salvage radiation

Posts.Content: I left the other info out because the only adverse finding on my final path report was a positive margin at the apex ( grade 3 at margin ) my final gleason was 3+4 everything else was negative thank GOD ! Im due for another psa test in december i was thinking about pulling the trigger on SRT if my psa went slightly above 0.1 ! .055 is still quite low will SRT now be better in stead of waiting its rising but very slow is it possible it will level off at some point ?
Posts.Title: Doubling time & salvage radiation

Posts.Content: RP August 2012 3+4 gleason positive margin at apex( grade 3 at margin ) ! Here is the infromation 10/15/2012 <0.05 standard assay , 01/15/2013 <0.05 standard assay , 04/30/2013 0.028 ultrasensitve assay , 07/01/2013 0.030 ultra , 09/05/2013 0.030 ultra , 11/12/2013 .040 ultra , 12/26/2013 .033 ultra , 02/10/2014 0.038 ultra , 04/10/2014 .044 ultra , 06/10/2014 .042 ultra , 08/11/2014 .047 ultra and the latest was 10/07/2014 .055 same lab except for the first 2 standard assays ! At what point should salvage radiation be considered ? As you can see some of the results were up and down along the way !
Posts.Title: Doubling time & salvage radiation

Posts.Content: Is there any scientific evidence that starting salvage radiation earlier say at .055 vs starting at 0.1 or 0.2 will produce a better outcome ?

Posts.Content: Thanks for the vote of confidence highlander , that ultrasensitive psa test can cause a man some sleepless nights if you are not educated about the different assays !
Posts.Title: Anyone else experiencing a bouncing psa post rp ?

Posts.Content: Yes 0.3 was a typo it was suppose to be .03 . I feel a lot better now but will keep an eye on my next psa test in Jan. to make sure there is no doubling time or upward trend of my psa ! Could benign tissue cause the psa to become detectable and low like mine ?
Posts.Title: Anyone else experiencing a bouncing psa post rp ?

Posts.Content: I am 15 months ( august 16 2012 ) post RP and my psa has been BOUNCING first using standard assay undetectable <0.05 , <0.05 then with the ultrasensitive assay detectable .028 ,0.30 , .030 now .040 which has me worried because of the increase all of the psa tests has been 2-3 months apart . Could the latest increase eventhough a slight increase and no doubling time from .030 to .040 be a lab error ? Is it time to radiate ? ANXIETY ANXIETY PLEAS HELP !

Posts.Title: What is my psa doubling time ? Please help !

Posts.Content: Just talked to the nurse she said my doubling time is right at 18 months guys which is fairly slow ! Now is it ok to continue to monitor my psa like I have been every 2-3 months or should i radiate now at .055 ? Feedback please !
Posts.Title: What is my psa doubling time ? Please help !

Posts.Content: Yes there was a positive margin at the apex ! I am scheduled for another psa test in december to see what the results will be and then if there is any huge increase I will decide then to start salvage radiation in Jan no later than Feb. 2015 ! I was thinking about waiting until at least 0.1 and rising to pull the trigger dpn't know if that will be too late !
Posts.Title: What is my psa doubling time ? Please help !

Posts.Content: Newporter I actually had a consultation with a radiation oncologist last year around this time he said h radiation alone would be sufficient in my case but that was then . My psa is increasing but not going haywire so when I see him again he may have something else in mind !
